object-descriptor.name: WaitStateNodeImpl
object-descriptor.description: A wait state node stops the execution of the proccess and returns control to the program that initiated the process execution. Thus, this node type is intended to be used in non-interactive process execution environments (i. e. business process execution vs. user interface proccess control). The calling program may resume the process again at a later time and may also pass arbitrary parameters that appear on the 'Out' socket of the node.
